meanings.sent1: Seeing a shooting star is an uncommon event for most people.
meanings.sent2: It is uncommon to find a four-leaf clover in the first try.
meanings.sent3: It would be uncommon to see a penguin flying in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as uncommon as finding a diamond in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow-colored bird was an uncommon sight in the forest.

meanings.sent1: His uncommon talent for painting left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: The team showed uncommon determination to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: It was uncommon to see a cat and a dog sharing a meal together.
meanings.sent4: The uncommon beauty of the sunset took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The uncommon courage of the firefighter saved many lives that day.
